Appointment Setting Call Center FAQs

What type of appointments can TeleDirect help with?

TeleDirect’s appointment setting services span all types of industries. It can be used to book medical consultations and procedures, open house viewings, in-person meetings and much more. If it goes into your firm’s calendar, TeleDirect can help schedule it.

What is a show rate?

The term “show rate” refers to the number of appointments and meetings that are kept by your customers and leads. Ideally, your company wants a higher show rate—that leads to more captured leads, sales and satisfied customers.

What’s better—live or automated support?

The answer to this depends on your industry! For many types of meetings, automated services are the perfect, streamlined way to make an appointment. For more complex appointments, like medical bookings, a live agent service may be preferable.
